    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    CryptoService
     
    DatagramSocketWrapper
    Wrapper for DatagramSocket to implement NetworkSocket interface
    DefaultCryptoService
     
    DefaultNetworkService
     
    DefaultSocketService
     
    DefaultTimeService
     
    DeviceControl
    Device control parameters for sending commands to GREE HVAC device
    DeviceInfo
    Information about a discovered GREE HVAC device
    DeviceStatus
    Current status and properties of a GREE HVAC device
    EncryptionService
    Handles encryption and decryption of GREE HVAC messages
    EncryptionService.DecryptedMessage
     
    EncryptionService.EncryptedMessage
     
    GreeHvac
    Main facade class for GREE HVAC library
    HvacClient
    GREE HVAC device client for controlling air conditioning units
    HvacClientOptions
    HVAC client configuration options
    HvacDiscovery
    Service for discovering GREE HVAC devices on the network
    HvacException
    Base exception for GREE HVAC client operations
    NetworkService
     
    NetworkService
    Interface for abstracting network operations to enable testing and dependency injection
    NetworkServiceImpl
    Real implementation of NetworkService using DatagramSocket
    NetworkSocket
    Interface representing a network socket for abstraction purposes
    Property
    Device properties constants
    PropertyTransformer
    Transforms device properties from vendor names to human friendly names and back
    PropertyValue
    Device property value constants
